cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 →(TrRel(c0)↔ TrRel(c1)))
⊣ (TrRel(c0)↔((c0 ∘ c0)⊆ c0 ∧ Rel(c0)))
⊣ (TrRel(c1)↔((c1 ∘ c1)⊆ c1 ∧ Rel(c1)))
⊣ (c0 = c1 →(Rel(c0)↔ Rel(c1)))

-| wb(wtrrel(c1), wa(wss(ccom(c1, c1), c1), wrel(c1)))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 = c1 →(TrRel(c0)↔ TrRel(c1)))

⊣ (TrRel(c1)↔((c1 ∘ c1)⊆ c1 ∧ Rel(c1)))

comment: Equality theorem for the transitive relation predicate. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 15-Apr-2019.) (Revised by Peter Mazsa, 23-Sep-2021.)
